allow:
Bash(tgit commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Send explicit file_download event to GA4 for external download links

GitHub-hosted downloads are on a different domain so GA4 enhanced
measurement won''t auto-track them. Send the standard file_download
event manually alongside the custom app_download event.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(tgit commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rewrite UI page for Electron app and fix Step 3 font size

Replace outdated WebUI content on usinglivevisualisation page with
new Electron desktop app features: interactive graph, toggle visibility,
drag nodes, working/staging panels, real-time updates, and repo selection.
Includes CSS-only interactive demos and scroll animations.
Also remove font-size:sm from Step 3 text on homepage to match other steps.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
